localize.text: Do you know there’s a cactus on your chaotic desk?
It looks like an employee who likes you put it there.
There could be various reasons for growing a plant.
Although, the vicious thorns are not pleasing to look at, and it doesn’t produce valuable sap either.
I’ve also never seen it grow a flower bud.
Theoretically, it would bloom in the right environment.
Could it be that it thinks the area is barren, since I’ve never seen it.
Do you think the cactus bear a flower?
You talk as if you've seen it for yourself.
Well, if you’re so sure about it then keep it.
This place doesn’t even have sunlight.
Why do you still keep it on your desk then?
Do you think it's rude to get rid of something you received as a gift?
Be careful, it could sting you when you reach for other things.
